msbt.message: I received your message. You put your heart and soul into it, didn't you? Such a beautiful outpouring. Anything I send you will pale in comparison, but here is a gift that I hope expresses my gratitude.
Reading the message you poured so much feeling into has filled my own heart to overflowing. So many words just for me! Thank you! Please accept this in return, darling. I insist!
My, my! I didn't realize you had the fire in you to write such a long and passionate letter! I can't hope to match the fervor of your writing with a simple gift, but I must express my thanks somehow!
I've read your message over and over since receiving it. I don't know how to thank you for having written such a very long letter just for me! I can only promise to cherish each and every word.

I received your message and I must confess, I was taken aback by the power of your many, many words! It's refreshing to see you express yourself so freely. Let the words inside flow forth like a river!
That was quite a flood of words you unleashed in your recent letter! Only you could be so bold and forthright, my dear. Well, one thing's for sure... You've given me a lot to think about.
I hope you like it. â€“
